parser.unknown-command: Unknown command! Use `{0}help` to get a list of available commands.
parser.missing-perms-user: You have insufficient permissions to use this command!
parser.missing-perms-bot: The bot has insufficient permissions to execute this command! It requires administrator permissions to work properly.
parser.missing-arg:
Not enough arguments specified!
Missing argument: `{0}`

arg-format.command_module: Enter a name of a valid module or command.

help.name: Help
help.desc: If `{0}` isn't specified, shows all modules. If `{0}` is the name of a module, shows all commands of the module. If `{0}` is the name of a command, shows detailed information about the command.
help.module-list: This is a list of all loaded modules.
help.command-list: This is a list of all commands in **{0}**.
